definition[0]: to change the structure of an activity, organization etc so that it performs better
example[0]: They reengineered the department, and cut nearly 400 jobs.
definition[1]: to improve the design of a product
example[1]: Radio networks are being reengineered to give digital operation.
example[2]: The carâ€™s suspension has been re-engineered.
example[3]: Businesses continue to re-engineer and lose administrative staff.
example[4]: American Express said it was re-engineering its global electronic system for processing credit-card transactions.
